name: OCC Affirms Banks May Hold Crypto to Pay Network Fees
description: The entity, hulking and brass-cased, submits to the mandatory infusion. Shimmering liquid syntax—the Crypto Fee—flows into its corrupted data port. This is the ritual dissolution: the old skin yields to algorithmic weather and procedural dust, achieving sacred kinetic geometry.

properties.caption: The entity, hulking and brass-cased, submits to the mandatory infusion. Shimmering liquid syntax—the Crypto Fee—flows into its corrupted data port. This is the ritual dissolution: the old skin yields to algorithmic weather and procedural dust, achieving sacred kinetic geometry.
